name: @mile-quest/backend
description: AWS Lambda backend for Mile Quest

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lambda
scripts.build:lambda: mkdir -p dist/lambda/auth dist/lambda/users dist/lambda/teams dist/lambda/activities dist/lambda/dashboard && esbuild src/lambda/auth/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/lambda/auth/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:pg-native && esbuild src/lambda/users/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/lambda/users/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:pg-native && esbuild src/lambda/teams/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/lambda/teams/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:pg-native && esbuild src/lambda/activities/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/lambda/activities/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:pg-native && esbuild src/lambda/dashboard/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/lambda/dashboard/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:pg-native
scripts.dev: npm run build && sam local start-api --port 3001
